meanings.definition: The framework of a bed, typically including a headboard and footboard.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy bedstead held up the mattress.
meanings.sent2: She painted the bedstead to match the walls of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide under the bedstead and surprise everyone.
meanings.sent4: His dreams danced around the bedstead like fireflies in the night.
meanings.sent5: The old bedstead creaked softly as she settled in for the night.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture used as a support for a mattress.
meanings.sent1: The antique bedstead added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The bedstead was made of solid oak and lasted for generations.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chewed on the bedstead legs, thinking they were bones.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes and dreams were woven into the fabric of the bedstead.
meanings.sent5: The bedstead stood proudly in the center of the cozy bedroom.
